response.overview: After being fired at his job following a violent outburst, Henry Bittle (James Letteri) decides to take revenge on his verbally abusive boss (Lynna Premo) with an attack at her home. As a result, he traumatizes her 11 year old daughter Chloe (Isabella Clementine) who becomes tormented with constant horrifying nightmares of Henry killing her. As her mother slips off into a world of alcoholism to battle her own demons and PTSD from the attack, Chloe decides that the only way to stop the nightmares is to find Henry and kill him. But Henry has some very dark ideas of his own as he lives out some of the gruesome fantasies in his mind, making him more dangerous and perverse than Chloe could ever imagine.
response.tagline: Sometimes Reality Can Be Your Worst Nightmare
response.title: Fragments of A Ghoulish Mind
